name: Kattie and the chateau
description:
Warning : 

- It is recommended to play in AZERTY

- If you arrive in front of the "Thank you for playing" screen it does not mean that the game is over, you have just simply finished your game (restart the game to redo a game)

You play as Kattie, a young cat who, knowing of the existence of a kitten, is alone and in danger in an old ruined castle. So you decide to go save him but you realize that it's not just him who needs help.
